name: CubiCo - Ludum Dare 42 Game Jam Edition
name_original: CubiCo - Ludum Dare 42 Game Jam Edition
description:
A puzzle game where you control a businessman trying to get to an interview. Created in 72 hours for the Ludum Dare Jam. 

Controls:

WASD or Arrow Keys for movement

R to restart level

Esc to pause
